ygData.rawEmail:
X-Digest-Num: 52
Message-ID: <17248.52.135.959279670@...>
Date: 19 Oct 1999 21:53:09 -0000
From: dimento@...
Subject: Gladiator-general

Hello,
I just started playing Gladiator recently
and I must say that it's a heck of a game. I've
visited the official page at http://www.fsgames.com
and I've visited http://plaza.v-wave.com/shayd/
It seems that nothing's happenning any more though...
(1) When is Gladiator: Beyond Freedom coming out?
(2) Is there a demo out there for Beyond Freedom?
(3) Are there any other sites/links I can visit
relating to Gladiator other than the ones mentioned
above?
(4) Is the FSGAMES group still developing games?
Anyways, I'd just like to send out a hello to 
everyone on this list and compliment the programmers
on a game well-made.
